bibl.title: The Biapsidal Church at Sidi Mahmud (Burg al-Arab) in Maryut.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Early Christian church excavated by the Egyptian Antiquities Organization, 1982-1986. - 1. Description of the church (P.Gr.). - 2. The Finds (F.Kh.).

Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 33 (1994) pp. 79-90, 2 figg. et pll. X-XI.
